survey_name: Gen Z Workplace Digital Collaboration Tools Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to understand the preferences and satisfaction levels of Gen Z employees with digital collaboration tools used in the workplace.

questions.question_text: Which digital collaboration tools do you currently use at work?
questions.client_notes: Consider including an 'Other' option to capture tools not listed.

script.question_text: Which digital collaboration tools do you currently use at work?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the digital collaboration tools provided by your employer?
questions.client_notes: Use a balanced scale to measure satisfaction levels accurately.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the digital collaboration tools provided by your employer?

questions.question_text: What features do you find most valuable in digital collaboration tools?
questions.client_notes: This helps identify which features are prioritized by Gen Z employees.

script.question_text: What features do you find most valuable in digital collaboration tools?

questions.question_text: How often do you experience technical issues with your digital collaboration tools?
questions.client_notes: This question helps assess the reliability of the tools.

script.question_text: How often do you experience technical issues with your digital collaboration tools?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the digital collaboration tools you use?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended responses can provide valuable qualitative insights.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the digital collaboration tools you use?
